author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In the heart of Texas, a tale unfolds,
Of Samsung artificers and gold they hold.
With passion and precision, they craft and enhance,
A sanctuary for semiconductors in the Western expanse.

Tangled in conflict is Biden's stand,
Between Israel's force and Iran's demand.
As leaders and nations in strife do bind,
His heart is assailed, from front and behind.

Now miners, their hopes on high terrain,
In gleaming deposits of aluminum vein,
Prospect from bleak Russia's frosty mien,
Their fortune to seize in copper and nickel's gleam.

feedItems.title: Samsung Electronics Gets $6.4 Billion for Texas Chip Plants
feedItems.description: The expansion includes a second factory, an advanced chip-packaging facility and research-and-development capabilities.

feedItems.title: Israel Had Created Enormous Political Trouble for Biden. Then Iran Attacked.
feedItems.description: The president faces pressure from both his left and right on the Middle East conflict.

feedItems.title: Aluminum, Copper and Nickel Miners to Gain From Russian Metals Ban
feedItems.description: Aluminum, copper and nickel miners should benefit from U.S. and U.K. restrictions on trading of Russian metals, potentially boosting prices over the medium term, Jefferies said.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In the heart of Amsterdam, whispers turn to song,
CVC's dance in the golden, money-scented throng.
A goat in a market, capers high and grand,
Speaks in echoes of silver, new wealth at hand.

The snails of OPEC in cautious counsel meet,
They fear the surge of oil's rhythm, its thunderous beat.
For if it creeps too high, knocking demand askew,
Their garden of riches may lose its golden hue.

In the morning's early light, hares startled leap,
Shares dip and oil's melody begins to sleep.
Majors shake in Europe's looming shadow wide,
Held in the gentle grip of a tense Middle-East tide.

feedItems.title: CVC Confirms Amsterdam IPO Plan
feedItems.description: Global buyout firm CVC said it plans to float on Euronext Amsterdam, raising $266 million in new money from the IPO.

feedItems.title: OPEC Wouldn't Want to See Oil Prices Surging Too High, ING Says
feedItems.description: OPEC members likely don’t want to see oil prices rising too high as that would risk damaging demand, ING said.

feedItems.title: Shares in European Oil Majors Fall as Oil Dips
feedItems.description: Shares in European oil-and-gas majors fell in early trading as oil prices dipped despite heightened Middle East tensions.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In Commerzbank's halls of gold, where scholars count and stare,
The Treasury-Bund yield doth unfold, by economic prayer.
Like ale in kegs of plenty, spread 'twixt here and distant lands,
In bonds and coins aplenty, guided by wise hands.

BNP Paribas, a tavern rich and fine,
From Fosun buys Ageas, for coin no less than divine.
Like monk who trades his holy wine, for handfuls of the East,
So do economic powers, in their eternal feast.

Once Apple's reign was mighty, as lords of smartphone's day,
Now Samsung sits in majesty, while Apple yields the sway.
Just as the humble brewer, oft overtakes the wine,
Even so in device-lore, changes 'twixt thine and mine.

feedItems.title: Economic Data Point to Further Widening of U.S.-German Bond Yield Spread
feedItems.description: Economic fundamentals suggest more widening of the Treasury-Bund yield spreads, Commerzbank Research said.

feedItems.title: BNP Paribas Buys Fosun's Stake in Ageas
feedItems.description: BNP Paribas is buying Fosun’s 9% shareholding in Belgium insurer Ageas for roughly $777 million.

feedItems.title: Samsung Overtakes Apple as Smartphone Leader, IDC Says
feedItems.description: Samsung Electronics has overtaken Apple as the top smartphone provider, while Chinese companies took a bigger slice of the global market, according to research firm International Data Corporation.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In the East, a dragon staunchly stays its hand,
Steadfast and broad, o'er China's verdant land.
The bank doth withhold its golden strand,
Whilst frailty in numbers spreads across the sand.

In lands afar, where shadows of law dwell,
The raven of change does loudly knell.
In its talons, the seeds of AI held,
Foretelling a saga yet to be unfurled.

From western shores, an eagle took its flight,
With allies of old, to stand against the night.
Gathered they under star-spangled light,
To turn back the Persian in bitter fight.

feedItems.title: China's Central Bank Holds Key Policy Rates
feedItems.description: The People’s Bank of China kept key policy rates steady and drained liquidity from the banking sector as economic data shows fresh signs of weakness.

feedItems.title: The Lawsuits That Could Shape the Future of AI and Copyright Law
feedItems.description: Artificial intelligence is quickly evolving, but copyright law is still playing catch-up. A lawyer breaks down three of the biggest cases to explain how the law is evolving with this technology.

feedItems.title: How the U.S. Forged a Fragile Middle Eastern Alliance to Repel Iran's Israel Attack
feedItems.description: The American-led effort was years in the making and hadn’t been battle-tested when Tehran launched its missile and drone barrage against Israel.
